alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 6:16PM EDT until July 14 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lancaster County in south central Pennsylvania... Central York County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 616 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mount Wolf, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bainbridge, Hallam and Valley View around 620 PM EDT. Maytown, Marietta and Wrightsville around 640 PM EDT. Mount Joy, Elizabethtown and Columbia around 650 PM EDT. Manheim and Salunga-Landisville around 700 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include York Haven, Elizabethtown College, Penn State York, Goldsboro and Lancaster Airport. This includes the following Interstates... The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 266 to 268. Interstate 83 from mile markers 17 to 31. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
